name: Rob Graver
description:
Story

Rob graver is a world rebound grave robber, help him by finding the golden graves! Luckily Rob has his trusty ol' shotgun for a light, but watch out for ghosts; if you touch them you leave the realm of the living!

Controls

Arrow keys: Move

X: Jump

Z: Shotgun (Shotgun is useless against ghosts its just a light)

Goal: 

Hazard:
